compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/media/Feidhmchláir/Tionscadail/AMGE/aws.serviceRawFile:
service: aws-api-gateway-crud-rest-api

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: eu-west-1  
  stage: ${opt:stage, 'dev'}  # Allows specifying the stage (e.g., dev, prod)
  profile: serverless-deployer
  deploymentBucket:
    name: amge-deployment-bucket

functions:
  create:
    handler: src/handlers/create.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: items
          method: post

  read:
    handler: src/handlers/read.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: items/{id}
          method: get

  update:
    handler: src/handlers/update.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: items/{id}
          method: put

  delete:
    handler: src/handlers/delete.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: items/{id}
          method: delete

resources:
  Resources:
    ItemsTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ItemsTable
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: id
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: id
            KeyType: HASH
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
